review: By far one of the most amazing products I've bought yet. This thing is amazing! I've bought 5 of these so far, and they make great gifts for family and friends. Not only is it extremely easy to setup and use, but developers are constantly adding support for Chromecast. The beta feature in Google Chrome lets you cast your Chrome browser to your TV. The lag is easy to overlook, but I'm sure this will be improved in later software updates. I do hope Spotify will support Chromecast so I will not have to use their web player, the volume tends to swing. There are minor bugs with this device but the price makes up for it. With later hardware updates to come, this is definitely the future of streaming.
author: Jakob L.

review: I love this inexpensive but elegant Chromecast from Google.  I set it up in 5 minutes, it took 20 minutes to update itself, and I was streaming movies 5 minutes after that.  Almost no lag between selection and appearance on my TV screen, with excellent clarity of picture.  What a bargain!
author: Rick Boys
